00031 void QMeter::drawCrown(QPainter *painter)
00032 {
00033         QRadialGradient haloGradientw(0, 0, 49, 0, 0);
00034         haloGradientw.setColorAt(0.0, Qt::lightGray);
00035         haloGradientw.setColorAt(0.8, Qt::darkGray);
00036         haloGradientw.setColorAt(0.9, Qt::white);
00037         haloGradientw.setColorAt(1.0, Qt::black);
00038         painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00039         painter->setBrush(haloGradientw);
00040         painter->drawEllipse(-49, -49, 98, 98); 
00041 }

00044 void QMeter::drawBackground(QPainter *painter)
00045 {
00046         painter->setBrush(m_background);
00047         painter->drawEllipse(-45, -45, 90, 90);
00048 }

00051 void QMeter::drawTicks(QPainter *painter)
00052 {
00053         painter->save();
00054         painter->setPen(m_foreground);
00055         int nSteps=m_steps;
00056         painter->rotate(-m_startAngle) ;        
00057         double angleStep=(-m_endAngle+m_startAngle)/m_steps;
00058         for ( int i=0; i<=nSteps*2;i++ ) 
00059         {
00060                 if(i&0x0001)
00061                  painter->drawLine(22,0,24,0 );
00062                 else
00063                  painter->drawLine(20,0,25,0 );
00064                 painter->rotate( angleStep/2 );         
00065         }               
00066         painter->restore();     
00067 }

00069 
00070 void QMeter::drawScale(QPainter *painter)
00071 {
00072         painter->save();
00073         painter->setPen(m_foreground);
00074         double startRad=m_startAngle*3.14/180.0;
00075         startRad+=3.14/2;
00076         double deltaRad=(m_endAngle-m_startAngle)/(m_steps)*(3.14/180);
00077         double sina,cosa;
00078         for ( int i=0; i<=m_steps; i++ ) 
00079         {
00080                 sina=sin((double)(startRad+i*deltaRad));
00081                 cosa=cos((double)(startRad+i*deltaRad));                        
00082                 double tmpVal=i*((m_maxValue-m_minValue)/m_steps);
00083                 tmpVal+=m_minValue;
00084                 QString str = QString( "%1" ).arg(tmpVal,0,'f',m_precision);
00085                 QFontMetricsF fm( this->font() );
00086                 double w=fm.size(Qt::TextSingleLine,str).width();
00087                 double h=fm.size(Qt::TextSingleLine,str).height();
00088                 int x=(int)((35*sina)-(w/2));
00089                 int y=(int)((35*cosa)+(h/4));
00090                 painter->drawText(x,y,str);     
00091         }               
00092         painter->restore();     
00093 }

00096 void QMeter::drawUnits(QPainter *painter)
00097 {
00098         painter->setPen(m_foreground);
00099         painter->setBrush(m_foreground);
00100         QString str(m_units);
00101     QFont f=font();
00102     f.setPointSize(4);
00103     QFontMetricsF fm( f );
00104         double w=fm.size(Qt::TextSingleLine,str).width();
00105     QPainterPath path;
00106     path.addText(QPointF(-w/2,-10),f,m_units);
00107         painter->drawPath(path);        
00108 }

00110 
00111 void QMeter::drawNumericValue(QPainter *painter)
00112 {
00113         
00114         QString str = QString( "%1" ).arg(m_value,0,'f',m_precision);
00115     QFont f=font();
00116     QFontMetricsF fm( f );
00117         double w=fm.size(Qt::TextSingleLine,str).width();
00118         QColor color;
00119         
00120         if(!m_thresholdFlag)
00121      color=QColor(150, 150, 200);
00122         else
00123          color=Qt::red;
00124         
00125         painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00126         painter->setBrush(color);
00127         painter->drawRect(-20,20,40,14);                
00128         painter->setBrush(m_background);        
00129         painter->drawRect(-18,22,36,10);
00130         painter->setPen(m_foreground);
00131         painter->setBrush(m_foreground);
00132     QPainterPath path;
00133     path.addText(QPointF(-w/2,31),f,str);
00134         painter->drawPath(path);                
00135 }

00138 void QMeter::drawIndicator(QPainter *painter)
00139 {
00140         painter->save();
00141 
00142         painter->rotate(-90.0); 
00143         QPolygon pts;
00144         pts.setPoints( 3, -2,0,  2,0,  0,25 );
00145         int degRotate=0;
00146 
00147     degRotate = (int)( m_startAngle+(m_endAngle-m_startAngle)/(m_maxValue-m_minValue)*(m_value-m_minValue) );    
00148          
00149         painter->rotate( -degRotate );
00150     QRadialGradient haloGradient(0, 0, 20, 0, 0);
00151     haloGradient.setColorAt(0.0, QColor(255,120,120));
00152     haloGradient.setColorAt(1.0, QColor(200,20,20));
00153     painter->setPen(Qt::darkRed);       
00154         painter->setBrush(haloGradient);
00155         painter->drawConvexPolygon( pts );
00156         painter->restore();
00157         
00158         // draw indicator hat
00159         QColor niceBlue(150, 150, 200);
00160         QConicalGradient coneGradient(0, 0, -90.0);
00161     coneGradient.setColorAt(0.0, Qt::darkGray);
00162     coneGradient.setColorAt(0.2, niceBlue);
00163     coneGradient.setColorAt(0.5, Qt::white);
00164     coneGradient.setColorAt(1.0, Qt::darkGray);
00165     painter->setPen(Qt::NoPen);
00166     painter->setBrush(coneGradient);
00167     painter->drawEllipse(-5, -5, 10, 10);       
00168                 
00169         
00170         painter->restore();     
00171 }

00174 void QMeter::drawThresholdLine(QPainter *painter)
00175 {
00176     QColor color(Qt::red);
00177     color.setAlpha(80);
00178     QPen pen(color);
00179 
00180     double thresholdAngle = ( m_startAngle+(m_endAngle-m_startAngle)/(m_maxValue-m_minValue)*(m_threshold-m_minValue) );             
00181     pen.setWidth(5);
00182     painter->setPen(pen);
00183     painter->drawArc(-22,-22,44,44,(int)thresholdAngle*16,(int)(-thresholdAngle+m_endAngle)*16);
00184         
00185 }
